ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Experiment with support for Starlark as a configuration language. This could be integrated in the CLI like jsonnet or it could be integrated natively into Drone, depending on how useful it is. * https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/skylark/language.html * https://github.com/bazelbuild/examples/blob/master/android/firebase-cloud-messaging/app/BUILD#L9 * https://github.com/stripe/skycfg ``` load("//config/common/pipeline.sky", "pipeline") def main(ctx): return [ pipeline(ctx, os = 'linux', arch='amd64', name='amd64'), pipeline(ctx, os = 'linux', arch='arm64', name='arm64), pipeline(ctx, os = 'linux', arch='arm', name='arm32'), ] ```
